answer:
You don't have a lot of info about release date. :( I thought that would have been interesting...

Running time has more variance than I thought it would have, across all genres. 

Rotten tomatoes doesn't care about runtimes. Neither does IMDB rating.

Disney, Warner Bros, and Fox can afford to spend a lot of money on movies, especially contemporary fiction and drama.

Comedies are original screenplays, by and large.
